title: Repeals mandatory continuing education for architects
summary: Repeals a provision of the education law requiring mandatory continuing education for architects.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2318

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 18, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  M. MILLER  --  read once and referred to the
         Committee on Higher Education

       AN ACT to repeal section 7308 of the education law relating to mandatory
         continuing education for architects

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 7308 of the education law is REPEALED.
    2    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.








        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04327-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to repeal section 7308 of the education law relating to mandatory continuing education for architects
